question: The correct order of precedence in Python is

answers.answer: Parentheses, Exponentiation, Unary plus, Unary minus, Multiplication, Division, Floor division, Modulus (Remainder), Addition, Subtraction
Parentheses, Multiplication, Division, Floor division, Modulus (Remainder), Exponentiation, Unary plus, Unary minus, Addition, Subtraction
Parentheses, Exponentiation, Unary plus, Unary minus, Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, Floor division, Modulus (Remainder)
Parentheses, Addition, Subtraction, Exponentiation, Unary plus, Unary minus, Multiplication, Division, Floor division, Modulus (Remainder)
